w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Buttons
Simple Button
w:HTMLPanel.p: A button is a Button widget which can be styled with properties like type or size.
w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Types and size
w:HTMLPanel.p: Use the type attribute to stylize a button.
Use the size attribute to change the size.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Button type="DEFAULT" text="Default" /> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" text="Primary" /> <w:Button type="INFO" text="Info" /> <w:Button type="WARNING" text="Warning" /> <w:Button type="DANGER" text="Danger" /> <w:Button type="LINK" text="Link" /> <w:Button type="ICON" iconType="VIEW" /> <w:Button type="DEFAULT" text="Extra small" size="X_SMALL" /> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" text="Small" size="SMALL" /> <w:Button type="INFO" text="Default" size="DEFAULT" /> <w:Button type="WARNING" text="Large" size="LARGE" />

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Icon customization
w:HTMLPanel.p: Set the iconType property to customize the button with an icon.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Button type="DEFAULT" iconType="VIEW" text="Default" /> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" iconType="VIEW" text="Primary" /> <w:Button type="INFO" iconType="VIEW" text="Info" /> <w:Button type="WARNING" iconType="VIEW" text="Warning" /> <w:Button type="DANGER" iconType="VIEW" text="Danger" /> <w:Button type="LINK" iconType="VIEW" text="Link" /> <w:Button type="DEFAULT" iconType="VIEW" /> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" iconType="VIEW" /> <w:Button type="INFO" iconType="VIEW" /> <w:Button type="WARNING" iconType="VIEW" /> <w:Button type="DANGER" iconType="VIEW" /> <w:Button type="LINK" iconType="VIEW" />

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Button states
w:HTMLPanel.p: Set the active property to true for the button appears pressed.
Set the disabled property to true to disable the button.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Button type="DEFAULT" iconType="VIEW" text="Default" /> <w:Button type="DEFAULT" iconType="VIEW" text="Active" active="true"/> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" iconType="VIEW" text="Primary" /> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" iconType="VIEW" text="Primary Active" active="true"/> <w:Button type="DEFAULT" iconType="VIEW" text="Default" /> <w:Button type="DEFAULT" iconType="VIEW" text="Disabled}" disabled="true"/> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" iconType="VIEW" text="Primary" /> <w:Button type="PRIMARY" iconType="VIEW" text="Primary Disabled" disabled="true"/>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Dropdown Button
w:HTMLPanel.p: the ButtonDropdown is a button with a context menu.
The context menu can be composed of :

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:ButtonDropdown label="Dropdown button" type="PRIMARY" size="LARGE"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Layout"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Component"/> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Overview"/> </w:ButtonDropdown>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Icon customization
w:HTMLPanel.p: With the iconType property, add an icon to the dropdown. The label is not mandatory.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:ButtonDropdown iconType="VIEW" label="Dropdown button" type="PRIMARY" size="LARGE"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Layout"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink iconType="USERS" label="Component"/> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Overview"/> </w:ButtonDropdown> <w:ButtonDropdown iconType="VIEW" type="PRIMARY" size="LARGE"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Layout"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink iconType="ADD" label="Component"/> <w:NavLink active="true" label="Overview"/> </w:ButtonDropdown>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Button group
w:HTMLPanel.p: Group a serie of buttons together on a single line.
w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Size
w:HTMLPanel.p: Use any of these ButtonGroup.Size to change the size.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:ButtonGroup size="LARGE"> <w:Button text="Left"/> <w:Button text="middle"/> <w:Button text="right"/> </w:ButtonGroup> <w:ButtonGroup size="DEFAULT"> <w:Button text="Left"/> <w:Button text="middle"/> <w:Button text="right"/> </w:ButtonGroup> <w:ButtonGroup size="SMALL"> <w:Button text="Left"/> <w:Button text="middle"/> <w:Button text="right"/> </w:ButtonGroup> <w:ButtonGroup size="X_SMALL"> <w:Button text="Left"/> <w:Button text="middle"/> <w:Button text="right"/> </w:ButtonGroup>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Button customization
w:HTMLPanel.p: Each Button can be customize independently (type, iconType or active and disabled properties).

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:ButtonGroup size="LARGE"> <w:Button text="Left" iconType="SAVE" type="PRIMARY"/> <w:Button text="middle" type="DANGER" active="true"/> <w:Button text="right" iconType="VIEW" disabled="true"/> </w:ButtonGroup>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Dropdown use
w:HTMLPanel.p: A ButtonGroup can contains Button and DropdownButton.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:ButtonGroup> <w:Button text="Left" /> <w:Button text="Middle" /> <w:ButtonDropdown label="Middle button"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Middle Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Top"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Middle Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Bottom"/> </w:ButtonDropdown> <w:ButtonDropdown label="Right button"> <w:DropdownHeader label="First Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Top"/> <w:NavDivider/> <w:DropdownHeader label="Second Header"/> <w:NavLink label="Middle"/> <w:NavLink label="Bottom"/> </w:ButtonDropdown> </w:ButtonGroup>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Button toolbar

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:ButtonGroup type="TOOLBAR"> <w:ButtonGroup> <w:Button text="1" /> <w:Button text="2" /> <w:Button text="3" /> <w:Button text="4" /> </w:ButtonGroup> <w:ButtonGroup> <w:Button text="5" /> <w:Button text="6" /> <w:Button text="7" /> </w:ButtonGroup> <w:ButtonGroup> <w:Button text="8" /> </w:ButtonGroup> </w:ButtonGroup>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Vertical variation
w:HTMLPanel.p: Use the ButtonGroup.Type.VERTICALto make the set of Button appears verticaly.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:ButtonGroup type="VERTICAL"> <w:Button text="Top" /> <w:Button text="Middle Top" /> <w:Button text="Middle Bottom" /> <w:Button text="Bottom" /> </w:ButtonGroup>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Justified variation
w:HTMLPanel.p: Set the justified property to true to make the group stretch at his parents width.
